SELECT ttr.ID, ttr.TAG_ID, tti.KEYWORD AS LABEL, ttr.PARENT_ID, ttr.COLLECTION_ID FROM stan_blog_tag_relationship ttr JOIN stan_blog_tag_info tti ON ttr.TAG_ID = tti.ID AND tti.DELETED = false JOIN stan_blog_collection_info tci ON ttr.COLLECTION_ID = tci.CONTENT_ID AND tci.DELETED = false WHERE 1=1
AND ttr.PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
AND ttr.PARENT_ID is null
AND ttr.COLLECTION_ID = #{collectionId} AND ttr.DELETED = false ORDER BY tti.KEYWORD ASC
